DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare prochlorperazine plasma concentrations produced after administration of the test formulation with those produced after administration of a marketed reference product.
DOC.criteria: Good health as determined by lack of clinically significant abnormalities in health assessment performed at screening Positive test results for HIV or Hepatitis B or C History of allergy or sensitivity to Prochlorperazine or related drugs
